import requests
import time

API_TOKEN = "eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..HxIrlhz-5ZtEWRoo0aOritJtmF45nzmsAvErj-I8XZuqLooeYdOYvvSsxGUPiXW-NrJSZOxmtQG3cRZCjbL3f3MY1ns72wXKNcvE9kYAk4L77YNDtBTXPdpMcaD_oEyEGaytS83c8TEmSw8ickzYnb132AkE4eXL57wqI8VaPuyfvt6vWKV3NyNT7yz3pbaoos4gXwI9tYXpX4sgbRlCkk1TAo9NQu_LqNkKe3L0cyE1aDROnPE469MpZ8eKedhDg5OZClhLBYt_HyhoU1y7Qvo2V_v1N76063rhi50MqI586TUwmuIaEhOUG3DZoqlv9MQxQleaK23qeq51eQ7jJkhuzCPM7duK1r3zsZYKE0F7HkP200u4a3Ft-gf-JLxh1YBVCQXNY1vdhSeMVJfE-RyMiaPSn2A-s8n7HzmKyxhjp-FCmqLd3uLIJU3THSksbBVTb1JgC9aqYZ6DU83x8Df5qv4q9Fj-2pFUiH67QzejeRGFU2ZOf6f7kNTbyOwUDeROYdtsMeG4uR9VYWeYPEhCGNujxm4eO33SkpvQpaH6yw6q7U_RlqCFLLV5DJEztEjS2A8c8yZZ8OYt9vRTK1O4tGi_vt3h9JuT5IeHOPztqP1BGjHRgWtZ_FlnIpFX_woWKhBX703rMRvEszwEzy-IR_m248-wuWXMluO2Bwg"

headers = {
    "Authorization": f"Bearer {API_TOKEN}"
}

def fetch_account_info():
    url = "https://trading-api-v1.agiliumtrade.ai/users/current/accounts"
    try:
        response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
        data = response.json()
        print("Accounts:", data)
    except Exception as e:
        print("Error:", e)

while True:
    fetch_account_info()
    time.sleep(60)
requests
